text: Hey <@U026103R3> we should use a different room for the interviews
Or we should clear out every trace of adidas from the library
Yea let me think about that - happy to do either one really
but also don't want to be in an uncomfortable room
I'm leaning towards moving adidas stuff out of the library for those few days
<@U026103R3> are there meeting times established for the interview debriefs? I assume they will be after 5 on the days we have them, a rough estimate would be nice to inform my Friday night plans.
<@U0260V1BX> i want to pick your brain about Data Science Symposium. Mainly where to park, what to bring, etc.
hey <@U026E0ZNR> good call - i'll throw some time on each day for the wrap up
<@U026PLK4S> Yeah I'll come find you when I'm done eating
thank you!

<@U026PLK4S>: <@U026E0ZNR> <@U0265G76F> I just added Katrina to the research sessions on Monday and the 1:30-3:00 on Friday. I'm not sure we'll need all of those people in each interview so we can chat on the days of if one of us doesn't need to be there
cool
cool

on a similar note, it sounds like Amy and Adam want to join some sessions too, so I think we'll have to wing it a bit in terms of who joins when because the last thing I want is 5 people in the room with one interviewer feeling awkward or intimidated
yeah i don’t want more than 2 other people besides me
agreed
and james is joining me for the first 1 or 2 as co-interviewer
hm

we're going to keep the number down, and tomorrow when we set up the room we're going to test out having a google hangout running inthe interview room (with no monitor displaying) so that other observers can watch via hangouts in a diff room
oh interesting
worst case maybe i take notes via the hangout so we get other folks in the actual interview
can we also use that to record?
is that a thing?
possibly? not totally sure
but katrina did ask us to video record
so we can use the same camera we used to record the kickoff meetings
<http://www.reelseo.com/how-to-video-interview-google-hangouts/>

attachments.title: How-to Record Google Hangouts Video
attachments.text: Google Hangouts are a great way to record a video interview with multiple participants, and you can publish straight to your YouTube channel.
attachments.fallback: ReelSEO: How-to Record Google Hangouts Video

text: i designed that ^^^
gorgeous
i know.
i think the google hangout recording is an interesting idea, but i think it would be best to have a dedicated camera we could easily turn on and off and have continuous footage
but we'll test some stuff tomorrow to have a more informed opinion
yeah thats fine
if there are two mics is that going to fuck up sound somehow?
i know nothing about these things
we'll have to test it out cuz i dunno either :simple_smile:
two mics shouldn’t matter! you only get feedback when a mic can hear itself on a speaker - if we have everything in the room muted, should be fine
cooooool
